code: import{CardActionTypes}from'./card-types';export var toggleCardHidden=function toggleCardHidden(){return{type:CardActionTypes.CARD_USER_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CardActionTypes.CARD_USER_ADD,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CardActionTypes.CARD_REMOVE,payload:item};};export var removeEachItem=function removeEachItem(item){return{type:CardActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CardActionTypes.CLEAR_CART};};
